Flexible.Title: Adjusting the managed-schema of the spellcheck core 2
Flexible.Code: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- Solr managed schema - automatically generated - DO NOT EDIT --> <schema name="opencms_spellcheck" version="1.6"> <fieldType name="spell" class="solr.TextField" positionIncrementGap="100"> <analyzer type="index"> <tokenizer class="solr.WhitespaceTokenizerFactory"/> </analyzer> <analyzer type="query"> <tokenizer class="solr.WhitespaceTokenizerFactory"/> </analyzer> </fieldType> <field name="entry_de" type="spell" indexed="true" stored="true"/> <field name="entry_en" type="spell" indexed="true" stored="true"/> <field name="entry_es" type="spell" indexed="true" stored="true"/> <field name="entry_fr" type="spell" indexed="true" stored="true"/> <field name="entry_ru" type="spell" indexed="true" stored="true"/> <field name="entry_cs" type="spell" indexed="true" stored="true" /> </schema>
